title: The Comeback Book Club
itunes:title: The Comeback Book Club
description:
For our August Book Club we read The Comeback by Ella Berman. The book follows Grace Turner, a young actress who disappeared from Hollywood at the height of her career. During her rise to fame as a teenager, she was sexually and emotionally abused by Abel Yorke, the director who made her famous. After she’s invited to present him with a lifetime achievement award she begins to plot her revenge. Even though Grace is a pretty unlikeable character we still loved her story and root for her revenge. This book isn’t in either of our normal wheel houses, but we loved the story and hope you loved it too! Let’s discuss in the FB group!

 

 

Obsessions:

  • Shaker and Spoon 
  • H&M dresses

 

Instagram:

  • @misterzimi
  • @bookishandblack

 

We’re Reading:

  • Majesty (American Royals Book 2) by Katharine McGee
  • The Changeling by Victor LaValle
  • You Had Me at Hola  by Alexis Daria

 

September Book Club:

  • Majesty (American Royals Book 2) by Katharine McGee

 

Sponsor:

  • Night: Go to discovernight.com and get 20% off with code BOP20 at checkout.
  • Bon Viv Spiked Seltzer : Try one and take a photo of your favorite flavor and tag us on instagram!

 

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more!

 

Like and subscribe to RomComPods. Available wherever you listen to podcasts. Visit Grace’s blog, The Stripe. New posts daily!

 

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood and Becca @beccamfreeman.
